Class LatticeMouseListener

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.lattice.view.listener.LatticeMouseListener
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
CellValueListener, PositionListener
public abstract class LatticeMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

A mouse listener for the lattice.

Author:
David Bahr

Constructor Detail

LatticeMouseListener

public LatticeMouseListener(LatticeView graphics)
Create a listener for the mouse that will color cells when they are clicked.

Parameters:
graphics - A graphics panel with an update that can be called by this listener.
Method Detail

drawCell

public void drawCell(Cell cell,
                     int xPos,
                     int yPos)
Draws the specified cell at the specified position on the graphics.

Parameters:
cell - The CA cell that will be drawn.
xPos - The x-position of the cursor. The cell is placed in the lattice position that falls under the cursor.
yPos - The y-position of the cursor. The cell is placed in the lattice position that falls under the cursor.

updateGraphics

public void updateGraphics()
Makes sure that the JPanel is updated to reflect any changes.

Gets the graphics (lattice panel).

Returns:
The lattice panel.
